msg: Updated Windows.pm::create_user to use the add_user_to_group subroutine instead of using concatenating its own command for consistency. Removed grant_connect_method_access and grant_root_access subroutines. All they were doing is calling add_user_to_group.
Updated text in notify messages in Windows.pm: user_exists, add_user_to_group
